content.text: Based on the number of likes the content is ranked as popular.Content with most likes is considered the most popular.
The number of likes at language level or node level is yet to be clarified.
1) The Option "Popular" should list in the sort filter in wisdom and blog landing page.
2) Selecting popular option in sort filter should list the cards/titles in descending order of like counts of the content
3) Selecting popular should list the cards/titles in landing page based on the language , topic and content types in the filters.
4) Sort option need not display in the filter bar to indicate the active filter.
5) Popular sort option should be updated in the URL, based on the current ULR structure
6) Default sort option should be same as it is , ie. Newest

content.text: 1.	Guest & Logged-in User should be able to click the link “View All” links in the section mentioned above like, related content, web streams etc.
2.	Admin should be able to edit the label for view all links in all the sections mentioned.e.g the view all ink can be View All topics or View All Mahasivarathri webstream , Sell All Blog etc.
3.	Admin should be able to configure/update the topic or and content type in the URL specified to the view All link
4.	User should be able to navigate to the wisdom details page, with filter selected as the topic based on which the related content card selected.
5.	User should be able to land in the respective Sadhguru MMM landing pages form the appropriate MMM details pages.
6.	User should be able to navigate to the blog landing page from latest blog section by clicking the “View All” link.
